headline: Citigroup Maintains Neutral Rating on Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT)
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is among the 11 best military technology stocks to buy right now. On February 18, Citigroup analyst John Godyn maintained a Neutral rating on the stock with a price target of $673. The update is a reaffirmation of the firm’s earlier adjustment on February 5, when it lifted the price target […]
